description: PostgreSQL dashboard for pgSCV metrics (Prometheus version, pgSCV 0.8.4 edition)

panels.description: Current status of PostgreSQL service.
panels.title: Service status

panels.description: Rate of successfully executed statements per second.
panels.title: Statements

panels.description: Total number of log messages rate (per minute) with severity higher than LOG (e.g. WARNING, ERROR, FATAL and PANIC).
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Average response time calculated using time of executed statements.
panels.title: Response time, avg

panels.description: Current longest transaction activity, initiated by clients or background service (e.g. autovacuum).
panels.title: Longest activity

panels.description: Total number of connected clients.
panels.title: Connected clients

panels.description: Current role of PostgreSQL node (Primary or Replica).
panels.title: Role

panels.description: Total number of invalid indexed in cluster. See Tables panel for more detail.
panels.title: Total invalid indexes

panels.description: Query activity produced by connected clients.
panels.title: Client activity

panels.description: The most longest activity produced by connected clients and background services.
panels.title: Longest activity

panels.description: States of connections established by clients (doesn't include states of background services).
panels.title: Client connections

panels.description: States of connections by database/user/state (without idle* state and autovacuum)
panels.title: Client connections (without idle)

panels.description: Messages written to log, by severity.
panels.title: Log messages, per minute

panels.description: Total size of log directory in bytes.
panels.title: Log directory, bytes

panels.description: Important: when logging_collector is disabled, log metrics will not be collected.
panels.title: Logging settings

panels.description: The top-most executed statements.
panels.title: Calls

panels.description: The top-most statements by returned rows.
panels.title: Rows

panels.description: The top-most statements by total time (planning, executing and doing IO).
panels.title: Total time

panels.description: The top-most statements by IO time.
panels.title: IO time

panels.description: Wait events aggregated by type.
panels.title: Wait events, by type

panels.description: The top-most wait events occurred.
panels.title: Wait events

panels.description: Total number of locks acquired.
panels.title: Locks

panels.description: Total number of deadlocks per minute.
panels.title: Deadlocks, per minute

panels.description: Total amount of replication lag, when standbys left behind the master.
panels.title: Replication lag, bytes

panels.description: Total amount of replication lag, when standbys left behind the master.
panels.title: Replication lag, seconds

panels.description: Amount of WAL generated or received by Postgres instance.
panels.title: WAL write, bytes per second

panels.description: Total size of WAL directory, in bytes.
panels.title: WAL directory size

panels.description: WAL settings
panels.title: WAL settings

panels.description: Total number of automatic and user-initiated vacuum operations.
panels.title: Vacuums

panels.description: The top-most vacuumed tables.
panels.title: Vacuumed tables, per-minute

panels.description: Autovacuum settings.
panels.title: Autovacuum settings

panels.description: Total number transactions left before XID wraparound occurs.
panels.title: Transactions left before wraparound

panels.description: Total number of checkpoints occurred.
panels.title: Checkpoints

panels.description: Total writes performed by background services or by backends implicitly.
panels.title: Background writes

panels.description: Disk space usage by Postgres instance.
panels.title: Disk space usage

panels.description: Top databases by size.
panels.title: Databases

panels.description: Top tables by size in bytes.
panels.title: Tables

panels.description: Top indexes by size in bytes.
panels.title: Indexes

panels.description: Top databases by produced temporary files in bytes.
panels.title: Databases temporary files

panels.description: Total size of active temporary files in-flight.
panels.title: Temporary files in-flight

panels.description: The top-most tables which accessed sequentially.
panels.title: Sequential read, by rows

panels.description: The top-most tables with performed INSERTs per second.
panels.title: INSERTs

panels.description: Top-most tables with performed sequential scans  per minute.
panels.title: Sequential scans/min

panels.description: The top-most tables with performed UPDATEs (including HOT) per second.
panels.title: UPDATEs

panels.description: The top-most tables with dead tuples.
panels.title: Dead tuples

panels.description: The top-most tables with performed DELETEs per second.
panels.title: DELETEs

panels.description: Total amount of WAL segments (in bytes) which are not archived yet.
panels.title: WAL archiving lag, bytes

panels.description: Total amount of WAL segments processed per minute.
panels.title: WAL archiving, per minute

panels.description: Important: when WAL archiving is disabled, metrics will not be collected.
panels.title: WAL archiving settings

title: pgSCV: PostgreSQL
